short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A helper extension enabling additional capabilties between VeriClock and supported integrations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The VeriClock Browser Extension allows users to share certain information from their accounting or payroll platform with VeriClock.  VeriClock can use this information to automatically assign pay rates to the different hours worked by an employee.
